templateOptions.label: Api User
templateOptions.description: The UserName for the ApiUser that has rights to connect to the SDBHR API

templateOptions.label: Api Key
templateOptions.description: The ApiKey to connect to the SDBHR API

templateOptions.label: KlantNummer
templateOptions.description: The number of the customer. Usually these are three digit numbers

templateOptions.label: Base Url
templateOptions.description: The BaseUrl to the SDBHR environment

templateOptions.label: Past Threshold
templateOptions.description: The amount of months a contract's enddate can be in the past and still be included in the import

templateOptions.label: Future Threshold
templateOptions.description: The amount of months a contract's startdate can be in the future and still be included in the import
